long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabs Everywhere Manager! is a powerful browser extension designed to help you manage your tabs with ease and efficiency. With this extension, you can group, save, and organize your tabs to streamline your browsing experience. Features include:

*Easy tab creating grouping and saving
*Quick access to frequently visited tabs
*Seamless tab management and organization
*Customizable color preferences for a personalized experience
*Tooltip support for quick tab information.
*Session Management
*Tab Syncing
*Tap Tab to go to it directly!

Whether you're a power user with hundreds of tabs open or just someone looking to organize your daily browsing, Tabs Everywhere Manager! makes tab management simple and intuitive. Install now to take control of your tabs!
